price: (Bazabwirwa bati) “Uyu ni wo muriro mwajyaga muhinyura.”
arabic: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi al-nāru allatī kuntum bihā tukadhibūna
